name: The Other Side Of The Light
name_original: The Other Side Of The Light
description:
TOSOTL is a 2D platformer game in a medieval fantastic universe where you embody Jinseï a knight of light.

The world is down into darkness and oblivion, people forgot their life due to a curse launch by Nekros a wisard...

With Jinseï you have the power of the light ! You can throw your magical light spear to hunt darkness and reveal the light of the living world.

You will resolve and explore a bunch of level with enigma based on lighting and encounter some strange people or creature.

See the game project here : https://www.artstation.com/artwork/0nQyk8

You can discover my work on here : https://www.artstation.com/artwork/rAkawa

and here : https://www.artstation.com/artwork/ZGkKVm

Team:

Antoine Mulliez

Clement Boutevin

Lilian Réfrégés

Killian Delias (me)
